title: [LFP] Silver players
body:
Currently silver 3, looking for someone to just chill and play games with whether its ranked, normals, aram or whatever. Prefer someone around 16 years old that doesnt get too toxic over a loss or if I feed c:  ign: Zoudastaire

EDIT: I lied, dont add me, Im so bad omg

replies.body: OMG SO BAD REPORT PLS RITO CANT EVEN 1v5 go back to carboard ;)
